page.title: 08Games
page.content: There is a game that lots of us play called Werewolf.The only trouble is that we only play it in the{dark. You play it like this:first you{pick to see who is on(it depends how many are playing).If there are{seven} playing there are two on and{five off.The on people count to{four {hundred fast}and the off people go and hide.When the on people have{counted they{look}for the off people.When they have{found}the off people,the off people try to get away.The on people have to{catch}as many off people as they can.The{only}way to set the off people free is to tig them off.At the end of the game{the first two people who were caught are on.
